content:encoded:
Jeff Regan, Investigator brings us our first story on this week’s Case Closed. We hear Cain And Able And The Santa Maria, his episode from September 11, 1948.

(29:50) Our second case comes from This Is Your FBI. From March 22, 1946, we hear their story, The Wasteland Hideout.

Download CaseClosed731

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’d like to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
